Details: Evaluated payment gateway options suitable for Georgia, focusing on transaction fees, support, and integration documentation.
Chose preferred provider based on fees, reliability, and integration ease. Documented decision and backup options.
Implementing payment gateway API in backend and frontend. Testing with sandbox accounts and handling error cases.
Verify all payment scenarios including success, failure, and refunds. Document test cases and edge cases.
Create documentation for payment setup, troubleshooting, and user support.
Set up monitoring and alerts for payment issues. Review failed transactions and user complaints.
Define process for managing chargebacks and disputes with payment provider.
